text: Acanthosyris is a genus of plants in the family Santalaceae. It contains the following species:Plants of the World onlineCatalogue of Life: 30th January 2018 # Acanthosyris annonagustata C.Ulloa & P.M.Jørg. # Acanthosyris asipapote M.Nee # Acanthosyris falcata Griseb. # Acanthosyris glabrata (Stapf) Stauffer ex Govaerts # Acanthosyris paulo-alvinii G.M.Barroso # Acanthosyris spinescens (Mart. & Eichler) Griseb. ==References== Category:Santalaceae Category:Santalales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Acanthosyris
